content.text: 1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles, crushed, seasoning packet reserved
content.eamr: ( ing-3 "1 (3 ounce) package chicken flavored ramen noodles, crushed, seasoning packet reserved" )
( ing-4 "1 large head fresh broccoli, diced" )

content.text: 0) In a small bowl combine oil, vinegar, sugar and the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "combine"@19:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "oil"@27:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "vinegar"@32:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "sugar"@41:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "the seasoning packet from the ramen noodles"@51:94 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a small bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Mix well and refrigerate at least one hour before serving, or overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Mix"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "refrigerate"@16:27 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "at least one hour"@28:45 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-1-1 "overnight"@65:74 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-1-0 "before serving"@46:60 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) In a large bowl combine broccoli, carrots, green onions and sunflower seeds.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "combine"@19:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "broccoli"@27:35 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "carrots"@37:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "green onions"@46:58 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "sunflower seeds"@63:78 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-2-0 "a large bowl"@6:18 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Crush ramen noodles and stir in.
4) Pour dressing over salad about 10 minutes before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Pour"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( "dressing"@8:16 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "salad"@22:27 / FOOD )
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "10 minutes"@34:44 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-4-0 "before serving"@45:59 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)
